Package yaremax.com.sa_task_04_06.exception

Class GlobalExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
      • yaremax.com.sa_task_04_06.exception.GlobalExceptionHandler
  • @ControllerAdvice
public class GlobalExceptionHandler
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.method.annotation.ResponseEntityExceptionHandler
    Global exception handler class. This class is responsible for handling all kinds of exceptions that may occur during the execution of the application. It implements ResponseEntityExceptionHandler and overrides methods to handle specific exceptions.
    Since:
    2024-10-06
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yaremax

      Handles InvalidDataException, PropertyValueException, UsernameNotFoundException by calling handleException(RuntimeException, HttpServletRequest, HttpStatus) with the provided exception, request, and HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST.

      Handles DuplicateResourceException by calling handleException(RuntimeException, HttpServletRequest, HttpStatus) with the provided exception, request, and HttpStatus.CONFLICT.

      Handles IllegalStateException, NullPointerException, and IllegalArgumentException by calling handleException(RuntimeException, HttpServletRequest, HttpStatus) with the provided exception, request, and HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.

      Handles ResourceNotFoundException by calling handleException(RuntimeException, HttpServletRequest, HttpStatus) with the provided exception, request, and HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND.

      • handleBadRequestExceptions

        @ExceptionHandler({InvalidDataException.class,org.hibernate.PropertyValueException.class,org.springframework.security.core.userdetails.UsernameNotFoundException.class})
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> handleBadRequestExceptions​(java.lang.RuntimeException ex,
                                                                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Handles InvalidDataException, PropertyValueException, UsernameNotFoundException by calling handleException(RuntimeException, HttpServletRequest, HttpStatus) with the provided exception, request, and HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST.
        Parameters:
        ex - the exception to handle
        request - the HTTP servlet request
        Returns:
        the response entity containing the ApiException object
